name: Pool - 8 Ball, 9 Ball & Solo
description:
Pool 3-in-1 is the first Pool game ever released on the App Store! Dive yourself into the amazing world of Pool action with Pool app!

How about a nice pool game? This is the No.1 Pool game on the App Store and it's totally FREE!
Enjoy brilliant graphics, improved overall app performance, 3 game modes, play online vs your friends and users all over the Globe!

Built to blend exhilarating pool action, fun, and an engaging play together for a uniquely well rounded mobile gaming experience, Pool is a super realistic pool experience mixing a healthy dose of strategy, quick thinking, and accuracy to come out on top.
Sleek graphics, easy to master game controls and great presentation make Pool a real winner when it comes to reliable & addictive Pool play.

With Pool 3-in-1 you can:

* Choose any of 3 game modes: Solo, 8-Ball, 9-Ball
* Play with anyone using the same device
* Online game with random players around the world
* Invite Game Center friends and play Online
* Track Daily & Overall Top Game Score statistics
* Experience realistic game animation & graphics
* User friendly menu & touch controls for moving the cue
* iPhone 4, iPhone 5 and iPad support with Retina graphics

Suitable for children and adults alike, Pool is a well polished mobile gaming experience which incorporates a powerful physics engine, smooth colorful graphics, and a lightning quick reflexive gameplay style to provide a totally new spin on mobile Pool gaming for iOS app users.
Enjoy this incredible game!
